Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Session: Business spec standardization, translations, and go-to-market collateral

## Major Additions
- Created unified business_spec.md with cohesive storytelling flow (~460 lines)
- Created customer_story.md: condensed sales narrative (~180 lines)
- Added Spanish translations: business_spec_es.md and customer_story_es.md
- Created PITCH_DECK_PROMPT.md: AI presentation prompts for Gamma/slidedecks.ai
- Created TITLE_SLIDE_IMAGE_PROMPT.md: Image generation prompts + brand guidelines
- Added STYLE_GUIDE.md: Mandatory naming conventions quick reference

## Critical Fixes
- Fixed AI/Ai capitalization across all 10 documents (intentional: Ai=positive, AI=negative)
- Standardized company name to "Ai First" (no hyphen) everywhere
- Fixed 9 broken file references in Overview.md
- Removed duplicate Ai First Framework content from Product Strategy.md
- Removed duplicate H1 header in Overview.md

## Style Enforcement
- Updated CLAUDE.md with CRITICAL naming rules section
- Updated README.md with mandatory style warning
- Updated Overview.md to v1.1 with new document structure
- All future agents must follow Ai First naming conventions

## Value Additions
- Added demand intelligence value prop across CEO/CIO/CTO sections
- Added ServiceNow and Salesforce to integration ecosystems
- Clarity review report included for reference (42k lines of analysis)

## Impact
Complete business spec standardization with multilingual support, mandatory style
enforcement for all agents, and comprehensive go-to-market collateral ready for
enterprise sales and investor presentations.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
